amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 1014(c) of PL 107-56 as it applies to Homeland Security Grant Funding; and adds the text of H.R. 1544, "The Faster and Smarter Funding for First Responders Act of 2005", as passed by the House as a new section of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in part B of House Report 109-178 to strike section 1014(c) of PL 107-56 as it applies to Homeland Security Grant Funding; and to add H.R. 1544, The Faster and Smarter Funding for First Responders Act of 2005 as it was passed in the House as a new section of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowey amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
